医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究问题红酒比白葡萄酒的健康益处一个普遍的看法是，并非所有酒精饮料都是一样的。例如，红酒通常被认为是一种更健康的选择，许多人认为其高白藜芦醇含量（一种具有抗炎特性的抗氧化剂）可提供防止癌症的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/study-questions-the-health-benefits-of-red-wine-wine-over-white-wine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/study-questions-the-health-benefits-of-red-wine-over-white-white-white-wine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20191D53-6103-4964-95AA-84CEB4E37728 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 15:30:16 -0400 Study questions the health benefits of red wine over white wine
生殖司法原则改善了黑人分娩患者的围产期心理健康受生殖司法原则引导的围产期干预措施可能会对黑人分娩患者的围产期心理健康产生积极影响，也许是婴儿的心理健康发展，指出了在哈佛精神病学特刊中发表的系统评价，该评论是《哈佛对精神病学》的一部分，该评论是来自沃尔特斯·克鲁维尔（Wolters Kluwer）的利平科特（Lippincott）投资组合的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/reproductive-justice-justice-principles-principles-improve-perinatal-perinatal-mentatal-mental-mental-mental-health-for----------appx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/reproductive-justice-justice-principles-princlincles-improve-perinatal-mentatal-mentar-mental-mental-menthal-health-for--for-black-birack-birack-birack-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4E125F31-6CA8-4E3F-BA8A-EB7D24FEF832 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 15:20:12 -0400 Reproductive justice principles improve perinatal mental health for Black birthing patients
探索在糖尿病护理中使用AI进行精确高血压管理的使用Pennington生物医学研究中心的Yun Shen博士将带领一个团队探索AI在2型糖尿病护理中的精确高血压管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/exploring-the-ploring-the-cuse-use-for-precision-hypertension-management-management-in-diabetes-care-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/exploring-the-the-cuse-use-use-for-precision-hypertension-management-management-in-diabetes-care-care-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f965d032-f032-f0cc-42d7-a53e-909ff8beb81f Mon, 10 Mar 2025 15:02:26 -0400 Exploring the use of AI for precision hypertension management in diabetes care
通过鼻子感染疱疹会导致焦虑，运动障碍和认知缺陷单纯疱疹病毒-1（HSV-1）通常以引起水泡和疮的味道而闻名。但是在某些情况下，病毒可以迁移到眼睛或神经系统，导致严重的慢性症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/herpes-infection-infection-threough-therough-the-nose-can-lead-to-ancanciety-motor-motor-motor-ismairment-smigairment-ind-cognitive-Deacticits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/herpes-infection-infection-therough-therough-the-nose-can-lead-to-ancanice-motor-motor-motor-ismairment-motairment-ind-cognitive-Cognitive-Deficificits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9091371-774A-49DB-9F6E-2126C12BE477 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 14:59:32 -0400 Herpes infection through the nose can lead to anxiety, motor impairment and cognitive deficits
下一代，吸入COVID-19疫苗进入2期临床试验麦克马斯特大学的研究人员已经开始了第二代吸入的Covid-19疫苗的2期临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/next-generation-inhalet-covid-covid-19-vaccine-enters-enters-phase-phase-phase-phase-plase-2-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/next-generation-inhalet-inhaled-covid-covid-19-vaccine-enters-enters-phase-phase-phase-phase-2-clasical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff904be4-ff30-455A-85DB-3E7778C5FFCA9 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 14:29:19 -0400 Next-generation, inhaled COVID-19 vaccine enters phase-2 clinical trial
邻里因素为老年人的康复访问型TBI卫生的上下文社会决定因素（例如，农村居住和邻里经济因素）可能会影响脑外伤的老年人（TBI）获得基于社区的康复服务（TBI），这表明在3月/4月的《头部创伤恢复杂志》（JHTR）中进行了一项研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/neighborhood-factors-shape-hearapilitation-rehabilitation-access-for-for-for---------------------------------------------------------------------------------tbi.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/neighborhood-factors-shape-hehapilitation-rehabilitation-rehabilitation-access-for-for--for----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B1CAE200-FEA4-4AC9-B500-1D2EB2EB2337C1E Mon, 10 Mar 2025 14:25:17 -0400 Neighborhood factors shape rehabilitation access for older adults with TBI
激素可能会驱动男性和女性滥用阿片类药物的差异根据美国国立卫生研究院的说法，自1999年以来，阿片类药物流行在美国夺去了超过500万人的生命，其中大约四分之三的男性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/hormones-may-drive-the-differences-in-opioid-misus-misuse-misuse-bet-men-and-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/hormones-may-drive-the-differences-in-opioid-misus-misuse-misuse-misuse-bet-men-and-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41f6bf5e-52fe-4F86-BE73-9B624CDE8D97 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 14:19:40 -0400 Hormones may drive the differences in opioid misuse between men and women
压力和肥胖症会助长早期胰腺癌生长加州大学洛杉矶分校（UCLA）调查人员领导的一项新研究表明，慢性压力和不健康的饮食可能会共同助长胰腺癌的早期发展，从而阐明了生活方式因素如何导致最致命的恶性肿瘤之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/sress-ands-and--------------------to-found-to-fuel-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/sress-and---------------------------to-found-to-fuel-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860924D2-22-22d3-4CA1-AC7D-D0E1B46D2BBB Mon, 10 Mar 2025 14:05:00 -0400 Stress and obesity found to fuel early pancreatic cancer growth
突破性药物组合靶向肺癌中的KRAS突变肺癌治疗的突破可能会出现。 VCU Massey综合癌症中心的科学家已经发现了一种强大的组合疗法，该疗法利用了Sotorasib-An FDA批准的药物和一种称为FGTI-2734的实验药物，这可以使精度药物对具有高度抗性形式的肺癌的患者更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/breakthrough-drug-combination-targets-kras-kras-moint-in-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/breakthrough-drug-combination-targets-kras-kras-moint-in-nung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=664d62af-e52a-48CA-99ED-8C50C689C755 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 13:55:19 -0400 Breakthrough drug combination targets KRAS mutation in lung cancer
FDA警告不安全的紫外线魔杖进行消毒如果您使用紫外线魔杖对细菌进行消毒和杀死，或者正在考虑 - 请注意某些品牌可能会产生不安全的辐射水平，不应使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/fda-warns-against-unsafe-unsafe-uv-wands-for-disinfection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/fda-warns-against-unsafe-unsafe-uv-wands-for-disinfection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc8f407f-db82-482-48bc-beed-beed-c7fff4a4a220 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 13:26:16 -0400 FDA warns against unsafe UV wands for disinfection
